title: Global installations coordinator
stuffDone: Receiving orders from clients, coordinating hardware installations in retail environments. Being responsible for the logistics chain from our warehouse to installation, making sure our contractors had the hardware and knowledge needed to perform works in time. Also did technical advising and issue troubleshooting.
